apostle.notFound.title: Apostle not found
apostle.notFound.content: Unable to find an apostle with the provided token ID. Please verify the entered ID on the URL and try again.
list.noResults: No results were found for the provided filter.
page.landing.welcome.introduction: Evolution Labs is a DAPP under construction that aims providing gameplay improvements for Evolution Land and Apostle Arena. The upcoming features include integration with wallets, global apostle statistics, apostle pairs analysis and improved breeding experience.
page.features.apostleInfo.introduction: Page that enriches the apostle's information with rarity colors for each attribute, improving visibility of the attributes that the player is looking for.
page.features.apostleInfo.instructions: Copy and paste the apostle's ID or token ID in the field above and click the button.
page.features.apostleList.introduction: Page that provides detailed information for apostles, displaying rarity colors for attributes and cards, making it easier to compare apostles. It also allow searching apostles of a specific player.
page.features.rarityColors.introduction: Every apostle NFT is unique and have distinct characteristics. In order to make it easier to quickly analyze different aspects between multiple apostles, Evolution Labs categorize them with rarity colors for each one of their qualities.
page.features.rarityColors.potentialScor: The "$t(apostle.qualityMap.potentialScore)" quality represents the percentage of the maximum possible talent points that were filled based on the apostle's potential.
page.features.rarityColors.talents: The "$t(apostle.qualityMap.talent)" quality represents the percentage of the talent that was filled having 0 as minimum value and the potential as maximum.
page.features.rarityColors.vitalTalents: The "$t(apostle.qualityMap.healthTalent)" quality applies to the "$t(apostle.talents.healthPoints)" and "$t(apostle.talents.life)" talents which can vary from 50 (minimum) and 65 (maximum).
page.features.scoreIndicators.introducti: Apostle cards and information page have some exclusive score indicators:
page.features.scoreIndicators.battle: Battle score can vary from 0 to 400. Each apostle's battle ability ($t(apostle.abilities.attack), $t(apostle.abilities.defense), $t(apostle.abilities.healthPoints) and $t(apostle.abilities.criticalRate)) contribute with 100 points to this score indicator. Each ability percentage is calculated based on the minimum and the maximum ability values that the weakest and the strongest apostles could assume for that particular ability.
page.features.scoreIndicators.potential: The percentage of the maximum possible talent points that were filled based on the apostle's potential. For example, if the apostle has a potential of 108 and all the talents were also 108 (maxed out), this indicator would be 100. The only exceptions are the "$t(apostle.talents.healthPoints)" and "$t(apostle.talents.life)" talents that cannot be higher than 65 (except for #1 apostles which have 80).
page.features.scoreIndicators.talents: The sum of all the 10 apostles' talent points (including potential).
page.contribute.introduction: This tool is being developed for free by people who believe in Darwinia network ecosystem. If you liked the tool, you can support the developers by donating any amount of any coin or token using the addresses below:
page.contribute.address.evm.title: EVM networks (Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, Heco, etc.)
page.contribute.address.substrate.title: Substrate networks (Crab, Polkadot, Kusama, etc.)
page.contribute.address.bitcoin.title: Bitcoin network
page.contribute.translations.introductio: If you want to see Evolution Labs translated in your native language or any other language that you know, you can contribute by joining the translation project:
page.notFound.title: Page not found
page.notFound.content: The page you are looking for was not found. Please verify the entered URL and try again.
